name: Above Soldier (0.1)
description:
Embark on a brave top down shooter, where your strategic choices will determine your win or loss.

Above Soldier is a top down shooter, in which you play a Green soldier in a conquest match of 10-20 mins which result plays an important role in the war against Browns. During each match you need to decide where your army should focus their fire at, what supports to call, what outposts to conquer while managing the resource points appropriately. Each win grants Resource Points needed to buy improvement for your army to win more and more matches.
Conquering all maps is the goal, to extermine the Brown Army.
